author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: وَتَسْتَنِيرُ بِهِ وُجُوهُهُمْ وَتُسَرُّ بِهِ ذَواتُهُمْ، وَأَنْتَ تَعْلَمُ يا إِلهِي أَنَّ فَرَحَهُمْ فِي اسْتِعْلآءِ أَمْرِكَ وَإِعْلآءِ كَلِمَتِكَ فَأَظْهِرْ يا إِلهِي ما تَقَرُّ بِهِ عُيُونُهُمْ وَقَدِّرْ لَهُمْ خَيْرَ الدُّنْيا وَالآخِرَةِ إِنَّكَ
translation: Send, therefore, unto my loved ones, O my God, what will cheer their hearts, and illumine their faces, and delight their souls. Thou knowest, O my Lord, that their joy is to behold the exaltation of Thy Cause and the glorification of Thy word. Do Thou unveil, therefore, O my God, what will gladden their eyes, and ordain for them the good of this world and of the world which is to come.
